vv72:0.4_0: On the first occasion of those who had obtained the price.

vv72:2.1_0: Childrew to the heaven of the Three and Thirty,
vv72:2.3_0: Upariṭṭha, and divine maidens are found,

vv72:4.1_0: The god was delighted and happy,
vv72:4.3_0: that is the fruit of deeds.

vv72:7.1_0: First: Bhaddiya the eighth of the price.
